mapper.select: SELECT b.badge_id, b.badge_name, b.badge_content, b.badge_icon_path, b.badge_get_method, b.badge_rarity, ub.user_badge_status FROM tb_badge b LEFT JOIN tb_user_badge ub ON b.badge_id = ub.badge_id AND ub.user_id = #{userId}
